item.title: Philippines Cuts Banks' Reserve Ratio, May Extend Rate Pause
item.description: The Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas (BSP) has cut the reserve requirement ratio (RRR) of banks by 250 basis points to 9.5%, effective June 30. The RRR cut is expected to free up about PHP100 billion in liquidity for banks, which they can use to lend to businesses and consumers.
